005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IMarkupItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
016import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
017
018import java.io.IOException;
019
020import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
021import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
022import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
023import javax.xml.stream.events.StartElement;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public abstract class AbstractMarkupAdapter<TYPE extends IMarkupString<TYPE>>
028    extends AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter<TYPE, IMarkupItem> {
029
030  /**
031   * Construct a new adapter.
032   *
033   * @param clazz
034   *          the markup type class
035   */
036  protected AbstractMarkupAdapter(@NonNull Class<TYPE> clazz) {
037    super(clazz);
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
042    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  public boolean isXmlMixed() {
047    return true;
048  }
049
050  // TODO: verify that read/write methods cannot be generalized in the base class
051  @Override
052  public void writeXmlValue(
053      Object value,
054      StartElement parent,
055      XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory,
056      XMLEventWriter eventWriter)
057      throws IOException {
058
059    IMarkupString<?> markupString = (IMarkupString<?>) value;
060
061    try {
062      markupString.writeXHtml(
063          ObjectUtils.notNull(parent.getName().getNamespaceURI()),
064          eventFactory,
065          eventWriter);
066    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
067      throw new IOException(ex);
068    }
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public void writeXmlValue(Object value, QName parentName, XMLStreamWriter2 streamWriter)
073      throws IOException {
074    IMarkupString<?> markupString = (IMarkupString<?>) value;
075
076    try {
077      markupString.writeXHtml(
078          ObjectUtils.notNull(parentName.getNamespaceURI()),
079          streamWriter);
080    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
081      throw new IOException(ex);
082    }
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator) throws IOException {
087
088    IMarkupString<?> markupString;
089    try {
090      markupString = (IMarkupString<?>) value;
091    } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
092      throw new IOException(ex);
093    }
094
095    generator.writeString(markupString.toMarkdown().trim());
096  }
097}
